## isValidMatch variable

True when the match is currently active (i.e. it's query has a value)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isValidMatch: (match: SuggestStateMatch<import("@remirror/core-types").AnyFunction<void>> | undefined) => match is SuggestStateMatch<import("@remirror/core-types").AnyFunction<void>>
```
